abstract: Season 1. Eps. 10-13 (Each episode runs for 23 mins.) Ep. 10 Leap of faith--Ep. 11 Heroes--Ep. 12 The Shadow--Ep. 13 The Outsider
description: Episode of Series "Crash zone". Episode 10: When a stranger arrives at Catalyst with a new game he claims to have invented, Alex is eager to invest in it. When Mike discovers the game is stolen he teams up with Pi to save Alex from embarrassment. Episode 11: Marcello and Mike are forced to face some home truths about people they have idolised. Episode 12: After Marcello throws Catalyst into panic when he hacks into the computer system, the rest of the kids have to decide where to place their allegiances - with Marcello or Alex. Episode 13: When Virgil is 'captured' by opposing games company Sunijim, Marcello attempts to redeem himself in Alex's eyes by rescuing him. After he also runs into difficulties the friends use their computer skills to save them both and reunite the Crash Zone team. Cast includes Paul Pantano, Cassandra Magrath, Nikolai Nikolaeff, Frances Wang, Damien Bodie, Nicki Wendt and Matthew Parkinson. Teaching resources can be found at: http://www.actf.com.au/learning_centre_new/Learning_frameset.htm Accompanying website at: www.crashzone.tv
